titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff classification of certain plastic sheeting.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/8/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to grant duty-free treatment to non-woven porous sheets of specified man-made fiber materials used in water purification systems. Prohibits such materials from being subject to bilateral or multilateral arrangements that provide for quantitative import restrictions on man-made fiber textiles.
